website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you need a litter scooper with a long handle that puts you at a distance from that task at hand, but the scoop component needs some improvements.
pros: Features a lengthy, contoured handle that provides a 27-inch reach
Great for cat owners with sensitivities or allergies to litter, because you don't have to get close to the litter pan to scoop
cons: Scoop sifter is somewhat small, and won't hold large amounts of waste
Rounded shape isn't ideal for scooping debris from corners of a litter pan

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop
customer_reviews.text: The best feature that sets this one apart is the grid size. It's small enough to catch the "pieces" that other scoops miss but open enough to sift quickly and quicker than any plastic scoop design. It's worth it for that feature alone. Next, it is metal and will last forever and is easy to sanitize. The length of the handle is great. I understand the requests for a square scoop to get corner or larger. If you have lots to clean then that makes sense. Otherwise a quick scoop (except for corner) is done faster with this design. Maybe they can sell a prototype for a square and see how that works. 5 stars as it's the best scoop!
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for limited mobility!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and just had my fourth back surgery, but litter-scooping is still a necessity with the cost of the self-scooping gadgets so high. The Sand Dipper Jr. is the perfect length, and the head is large enough to scoop big lumps, with grating large enough to let the litter through without having to shake it. A backsaver, and I’ve recommended it to all my friends with limited mobility as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Junk...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I bought this because it was metal, in hopes that it would be stronger than the plastic versions. I loved the length of the product, but only after a few uses the basket piece on the bottom broke off from the prongs. There are only 2 small welded areas to keep it all together. If you use too much force when scooping, it will break! I would never purchase this product again or recommend it to anyone. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: JacksMom

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE: I received a replacement and it is exactly what I ordered this time. Company was very quick to offer a replacement and I am satisfied with my purchase. I’m 5ft and this jr dipper is perfect for me & I can’t wait to take it to the beach later this year. Thank you for making it right. The product clearly says handle included yet I received no handle just the short end. Received the day before my beach vacation. Major let down. It does work but the whole point was to not have to bend down as much.
customer_reviews.author: Devlebaba

customer_reviews.title: NOT DESIGNED FOR CLEANING CAT LITTER BOXES!
customer_reviews.text: NOT A TOOL FOR CLEANING CAT LITTER BOXES. Not ergonomic - designed for straight scooping. Cleaning litter boxes necessitates a variety of motions that your hand grip design does not adapt to without pain and strain, partly because the basket is designed for straight/linear scooping through sand. Also best used by people less than 4.5' tall or seated, which then diminishes the benefit of not having your face near the scooping area. : ( Keep working on changing the design - and you could have a #1 litter scoop someday.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Day

customer_reviews.title: Sand Dipper Jr Saved My Back!
customer_reviews.text: This Sand Dipper Jr wire scoop has really helped my bad back when cleaning our cats' litter boxes. The smaller head fits into the rounded corners of the box more easily than the larger headed scoops. The wire basket cleans up more easily, too. I had been using an old "Chinese spider" from my kitchen but the handle was not long enough and the net basket was flimsy & awkward. This well-made Sand Dipper Jr. solves those problems. Thank you Sand Dipper!
customer_reviews.author: SallyB

customer_reviews.title: I like this and it is very handy!
customer_reviews.text: As we have 3 cats scooping litter is a necessity as I can't use the clumping litter. We use this to scoop the solid waste between box changes. It works great and is really a back saver for me. My only wish would be that the basket be a little bigger so it would hold more when I scoop the poop. Large pieces don't always fit in the small basket.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice length, nice basket for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a telescopic one from a different seller and this one is nicer. (The telescopic one came with the locking piece missing, but they sent a new piece) The handle is a hard plastic, has a strap for easy carrying. I use it at the beach to pick up sea glass, the basket is deep enough to keep your treasures inside. It's a perfect length, unless you're 6 foot tall, or taller.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grand daughters to use at the beach for small rocks and shells etc.,. They are just the right size for 6 to 8 year olds! They are very nicely made and are a quality product. The girls can't wait to use them. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mertens

customer_reviews.title: No more bending over at the beach!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love using this...it save our backs every time!! Made very sound and looks like it will last a very long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsHuard

customer_reviews.title: Ling/habdled scoop makes cleaning possible!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who had several back surgeries and found it impossible tobend to clean the litter box. She was delighted with this long-handled scoop because it allowed her to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Mehegan

customer_reviews.title: SUPER AWESOME - can we give 10 stars??!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a PAWESOME product!!!! We have a Pet Lodge which on occasion, we do have some temperamental kitties. This product helps keep their litter boxes clean and us safe from kitties who prefer to not socialize with us! In addition, we have a few feral kitties around the property. We recently had one injured and trapped her to be able to rest her and give her meds. This product helps us drag the litter box to the front of the crate and scoop and slide it back to the back of the crate. SUPER AWESOME - can we give 10 stars??!!!!!! Because we would if we could! Thanks Sand Dipper - you ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: Roncy D. Roehm

customer_reviews.title: Dipper cup looks like a soup ladle.
customer_reviews.text: The utilitarian factor for me is zero. The scooping cup is too deep, too small, about the size of a teacup, and too fragile for scooping impacted litter. It might work for kittens whose waste products are tiny, but not for full-grown cats. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy, seemingly durable thus far.  Saving me from holding my breath is a godsend!
customer_reviews.text: need a bigger scoop portion, but the length of the stick is the savior here.....tired of holding my breath while I "go in" to scoop. I really love our kitties and cats in general, but litter duty is damn near as excruciating as the cats are enjoyable. pretty sturdy setup, but don't trust it that much. I've had the screwable section on another scooper break on me, so I have experienced it's limits, but the handle and green portion of the stick are sturdy and seem like they'll endure. I'll post an update once it's withstood some of the tests of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great little device!
customer_reviews.text: You know, I was skeptical about this but darn if it didn't turn out fine. My husbands job is the kitty litter box. So he goes on a trip and I have to take over that lovely job. So, as I'm scooping, I am thinking, "why they heck is my nose almost in the litter pan while doing this filthy job?!" Enter the long handle dipper! No more nose in the litter box and works perfectly!! Husband came home and told me what a brilliant idea I had!
customer_reviews.author: Wittkopp

customer_reviews.title: Great for People who cannot bend or have back/hip/knee problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to be able to clean litter pans without bending post hip surgery. Serves its purpose well. Yes, if you try to scoop up wet litter it will sometimes clog the holes in the scooper but that also happens with a regular plastic short handle scooper. Solution is to wipe it out with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Alice T

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Poop Sccop
customer_reviews.text: Best chicken poop scoop ever. Perfect sized mesh and with just a little bending, it takes me just about 3 minutes to clean the chicken run that is 8 x 20 with a 6 inch sand base.I am 5'4" and the 27 inch length could be just a bit longer. The bowl size lends to easy manipulation in order to get the poop into the scoop from the sand.
customer_reviews.author: dvcrztb

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and useful
customer_reviews.text: This long handled back saver cat litter scoop works great. Bending over and cleaning the litter pans was painful when I injured my back and hip. I'm feeling much better now, but am so glad I had purchased this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up rocks at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for picking up rocks at the beach because I saw someone else using one. It really saves the back. You have to bend some but not all the way down. It works great as long as the rocks you are looking for are bigger than the holes which is what I look for. It sifts the sand and small rocks out. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this. I just had back surgery and couldn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. I just had back surgery and couldn’t bend down to clean the litter. The way this is shaped didn’t allow for effective scooping. If it bended this would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cat Litter Dipper
customer_reviews.text: So much better than bending over to scoop the litter box. Does a great job. The only problem was finding an out of the way place to hang it. litter box is in the bathroom so for now just hanging it behind the door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean my cat's litter box while recovering from a back injury that prevented bending. I thought the small, round scoop head would be better than the more shovel-like shape of long-handled litter box scoops for more easily dumping out what was scooped up -- and I was right. The one caveat is that if you're more than 5' 5" or so, you will have to bend too much for this scoop to be helpful for back troubles. The scoop itself is very sturdy and sifts very well.
customer_reviews.author: J_Rose

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The two parts will not stay screwed together. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.Works excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: got this when I had back surgery. life goes on and I had to find a solution. This was it ! works great. you can stand up and reach whole box.
customer_reviews.author: june bug

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use for cleaning up  any place!
customer_reviews.text: it very easy to use, and prefect for clean my chicken coop daily , it smart idea way to not bend your back for cleaning cat litter to any bird cage are hard to reach
customer_reviews.author: Amber Unrast

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the old plastic scoop I've been using.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow, I've gotten stuck with cat maintenance for my wife's cat, cleaning the cat box got rolled into the taking the trash out chores... So, I decided to try one of these guys out. I like it much better than the short handles scoop we used to have, the further I can stay from the buried treasure the better in my opinion. It also sifts quickly, and gets most of the chunks except for the smallest. The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is that I think it could be a bit more sturdy, I can see the scoop end getting bent at some point.
customer_reviews.author: escortwagon313

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually, I am not hopeful with items made easier for one. But, this is wonderful. After hip surgery, couldn't bend more than 90 degrees. What to do about litter box. Neighbors helped, but that gets old for them. Voilla, the extended litter scoop. Scoop is the right size, strong to pull away litter, handle is strong and sturdy. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent back saving scooper!
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely helpful when you can't bend over or stoop down! Very handy and easy to use. Comfortable grip handle with strap to hang it when not using. Basket is sturdy and just the right size; it's easy on the wrist one-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Sevret

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but scoop is too rounded, doesn't scoop litter box corners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for someone who has back problems. I thought it would help her in scooping the litter box. It is well made. But, we found that the handle is a little too short for her needs. She still needs to bend further than is comfortable. And, very noticeably, we found it hard to clean the litter. Instead of a rounded scoop, it needs a sharper or more square scoop to get the corners of the litter box. For us, this is a favorite spot in the litter box. It is well made, and if they reshape the scoop and make the handle a little longer or adjustable; I would be open to trying it again.
customer_reviews.author: GTn Cats

customer_reviews.title: Half good half bad.
customer_reviews.text: The handle is premium quality but the metal basket is too crooked once assembled. Hard to explain but it's not straight. Never tried it out. But was intended to use in chicken coop with wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Bought for sea glass hunting/sifting
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy, handle screws off for easy carry. I purchased for sifting thru sand at the beach to find sea glass....not cat litter scooping. Seams perfect for what I've bought it for though. can't wait to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than bended knee scooping!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop greatly reduced the back strain of cleaning a litter box with a standard shovel. We wish the handle was another six inches longer so there would be little to no bending and also have a larger diameter scoop for greater sifting of litter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Has pros and cons.
customer_reviews.text: As far as litter box use, some bending over is still required to reach the "stuff", however, I'm far enough away from the dust cloud that I don't feel I'm inhaling it. The length and thinness of the handle prevents it from having as much scooping power as the shorter versions, especially when things are buried. It's a bit difficult to get the net down to the bottom of the box. The rounded shape is not ideal for scraping the sides or corners of a rectangular box, but these things I'm willing to work around to avoid inhaling the litter dust.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Poo Sifter Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this product on a chicken blog, The Chicken Chick. I have used this daily for sifting chicken poo out of their sand run and it works perfectly for this task! I wish I would have came up with this idea! Basically it is a hand held metal kitchen colander/sifter attached to hiking pole, ingenious! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for shark tooth hunting
customer_reviews.text: Great size for 10 year old grandson to scoop shark teeth from surf. Ok for adults also. I’m 5’3 and have to slightly bend over to scoop. Not a problem though. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect scoop for cat litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: I have an old back injury, so stooping to clean our cats' litter box can be challenging. The Sand Dipper Jr removes that problem. I just wish that the dipper basket was a bit larger as we have a twenty-pound Bengal, and the dipper cannot accommodate the size of his...ummm....left behinds.
customer_reviews.author: She Who Reads

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I bought it to search for shells as I live in Florida. It works perfectly for that and I actually have another one I use for my cat's litter. Love Love Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a help
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and have 6 cats. Even though I have 3 automatic litter box I have to clean the boxes where the automatic tines don't get clean. This metal scoop with a very long handle helps me clean the boxes without falling when I clean the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you can't bend at the waist
customer_reviews.text: Following hip surgery this has been a godsend. It's lightweight, well made, and honestly, much better at doing its job than my prior short-handled plastic scooper. Sturdy, and effective!
customer_reviews.author: chromodynamica

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be the perfect scoop for finding shells and sharks teeth. May be good for cat litter but not shelling.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I got this dipper for use at the beach to save my knees and it works great at picking up shells and sea glass. Even better if necessary it's sturdy enough that I could whack someone with it if I felt threatened.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sand Dipper Jr.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect !!!! The longer handle makes scooping a much cleaner and efficient process. The stainless steel wire mesh holes are larger than any of the plastic pet store scoops. I don't have to shake the scooper, just hold it up a few inches from the matter scooped and the remaining litter just drains through the larger steel mesh holes. It has already saved me litter. Thank you GOBUDi
customer_reviews.author: Bob 66 Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because I was having back surgery. What a blessing. Works great. Well made and adjustable. Buy this now!!!
customer_reviews.author: William N.

customer_reviews.title: Saves my back, my lungs, and my nose!
customer_reviews.text: This item fit my needs perfectly. I have a round, igloo type covered letterbox. I have never found a scoop that not only was long enough to keep me away from the dust, but worked beautifully on the rounded corners of my litterbox. As it is marine grade metal, I feel confident that dipping it in sanitized water to clean, will not cause it to rust. It is a very sturdy product, and just the right length. It's good for my back, my lungs, as well as my very sensitive nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats Meow
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today! As soon as I teach my Cat to use it... I will write another review. But so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Keith

customer_reviews.title: This handy little tool was great for shelling at Sanibel
customer_reviews.text: This handy little tool was great for shelling at Sanibel. I really appreciated that it disassembled into two pieces, making it easy to fit in my suitcase. My only wish is that the basket was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: cannot do the job
customer_reviews.text: it is extremely small. will not pick up 85% of most of the cats numbers one and two. Cannot scrap the bottom of the container of cat litter. Useless for me. Going to request a return. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Love this gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget. I have four litter boxes and by the time I'm done my back is killing me. Just did the littler boxes for the fist time with the Sand Dipper and no pained back! My only complaint is that since the basket it round, it's difficult to get everything out of corners but I'm willing to use the regular scoop for that. Overall, so far am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2", and while I still have to bend over a bit to use this scoop, it really has made the daily cleaning of the littler boxes much less of a hassle. The round shape means that it won't get into the corners of the box very easily, but I think it does an extremely good job otherwise. The handle is quite comfortable, and it even comes with a strap, which I guess would come in handy if you really had to brace yourself against a particularly stubborn deposit.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Almost met my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my hen house and chicken run. I love the size of the mesh but with the basket was bigger and flatter. Just my wish for design. Your description was accurate, I just didn't do my homework. Hoping it will work in the run when I get more sand.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR BACK!
customer_reviews.text: Best cat litter scooper EVER!! handle long enough - sturdy materials - no more bending way over and dealing w/plastic yuk ...
customer_reviews.author: NELLEHEART

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm working the garden with a hoe to break ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this scooper not to be strong enough, and it takes me at least twice as long to scoop the box. I feel like I'm working the garden with a hoe to break up the caked urine at the bottom of the box. We do scoop every day so there is no long term accumulation. The handle is also too short so I'm bending over anyway. We threw it away and ordered the Duranimals Durascoop. We have two male cats. Perhaps they produce more urine than others. This product just did not work for our house.
customer_reviews.author: tarainga

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought for my alderly grandparent and she could easily clean the cat box with out bending down
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love this cat litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: I loved this scooper for the cat litter box so much, I ordered one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Portal

customer_reviews.title: Love this for shelling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who loves to go shelling. It makes it easy for my mom to grab shells in deeper water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sand Dipper
customer_reviews.text: I thought it extended, but I am okay with it. I use it to find shark's teeth where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Great beach sand sifter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for searching for shells and sharks teeth at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for looking and scooping up stones in the lake. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: No More Bending to clean litterbox !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hip problem and cannot bend and have major hip replacement surgery upcoming in December so presently I can't bend to clean the litter box nor will I be able to bend that much during my recovery and rehab period so this was a GODSEND. I love it. It sifts wonderfully. It grabs and it's strong enough to scrape the bottom and get all the clumps of waste. I am thrilled with this item and it's very sturdy. Great buy and good price !
customer_reviews.author: Chanceyanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I've gotten alot of comments on it while out picking rocks. All positive!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pelcher

customer_reviews.title: I like the long handle and is well made
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work very well for a litter box, the round design prevents getting into corners. I like the long handle and is well made, but would work better as a sand scooper than a litter scooper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will be nice - difficult to screw together
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review because my husband figured out how to screw this together. Apparently I was not pushing it hard enough. I do wish it was easier to put together. I have not tried it for shelling yet which is my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: J Secord

customer_reviews.title: Extend your reach
customer_reviews.text: Used this to look for Agates in Lake Superior. Held up to some serious rock sifting and allowed me to reach out into the water. Didn't have a lot of luck finding rocks but it did make me look professional!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, bad execution
customer_reviews.text: This was a smart idea, but the scooper is too small to pick up much of anything at once. The rounded shape sucks at scraping the bottom of the pan. It's also so long that I lose accuracy...I'm standing too far from the kitty litter to have enough strength and coordination. It's an awkward tool. I wanted to love it but ended up using my regular scooper. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy to use! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! I've used it three times already. It is short. I should have ordered the longer one. But, overall this is a great item. I use it to collect seashells. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hojnacki

customer_reviews.title: The Sand Dipper is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The sand dipper is great! I am not allowed to bend for a while. It has been easy to scoop, and it stays much cleaner than plastic scoopers. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: After trying out this particular litter scooper, I was very disappointed. The scoop is so small, it takes much too long to scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Blades

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, and a good length for those I'd say under 5'8" I myself am 6'0" and still have to stoop a bit, they have one a bit longer that you should get if your over 5'8". I am glad to have it even with a stoop I have to do, it gives you a good distance from the litter and dust which is why I wanted it. I don't regret my purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnstons

customer_reviews.title: Best Scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Scoop ever! I have tried at least 6 different types and I would have to rate this one the highest. The holes are not too small and not too big, they can get the little pieces. I love the extension so I don't have to kill my back bending over the liter box. Very easy to use, and I will be ordering another for my 2nd liter box. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Seabea2013

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, did the job we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: We used this to sift through sand for shark teeth and shells. It's very sturdy, did the job we needed it for. Pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: It was well made but I wanted a finer scoop for the litter.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine e.

customer_reviews.title: Well made tool for the beachcomber
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for beachcombong. I am 6' and the scoop reachs the ground will only a few degrees of leaning forward. Great back saver. ,, good price
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00C0Z48MO/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_3
customer_reviews.text: I had spinal surgery recently and can't bend down. Wish I had purchased this back saver litter picker upper way before surgery. It really does a better job not only because of the length(no need to bend over), but is much better than those small plastic pooper scoopers I've been using for years. What a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: MS CAH

customer_reviews.title: How have I lived all my life without this product?
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Amazing! Two boxes two cats this does the job in record time. No fuss. No Muss. Oval shaped litter box this works like a charm. Square box takes a bit of practice to develop a technique on the corners. Did have a small issue that Customer Service handled ASAP. An exceptional gadget and quick and easy Customer Service.....now that is PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.author: Revrom

customer_reviews.title: Best cat scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: If for any reason, you have difficulty bending over a cat litter box to clean it, this is the product for you. It's well built, solid and works perfectly. I had reservations making this purchase, but I'm glad I purchased it. Is it a lifesaver for my back. Get it, you won't be sorry. And by the way, where else do you get a litter box scooper with a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems stooping and this was a godsend! glad I found it! It went together easily and is sturdy enough to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Super duper scooper
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who can't reach down to scoop the litter box; she loved this. Sturdy and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for people with cat litter and bad backs.
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best scoopers I ever had. however, it does NOT work on the pellet litter. The sieve holes are too small for pellets, only use the gravel/sand litter.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore N Guzzone

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this scooper
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this scooper, unfortunately the basket is a little small so it takes a while to clean the cat box. I do like that I'm not bending down as much!
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Length does prevent having to stoop or get near pan & risk inhalation of dust, but bowl is not nearly big enough. Takes twice or 3 tmes as long to remove solids as with cheaper, bigger short handled scoops. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paint Mare

customer_reviews.title: SeaShell Dipper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for picking up seashells from the edge of the water. I never go walking without it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda J. King

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use for cat litter box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother. So great as she does not need to bend down to clean the cat litter box. Great idea and product.
customer_reviews.author: Beejay Williams

customer_reviews.title: My cousin loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift after hearing my cousin complaining over the holidays about how cleaning the kitty litter (she has several cats) was hurting her back. A quick search on Amazon turned up exactly what she wanted (and didn't know existed). This was a perfect gift, and she has told me multiple times that it has been a real help.
customer_reviews.author: Digicrat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. It saves my back from squatting down to clean the littler boxes, and I am away from the dust. A back and lung saver!
customer_reviews.author: KAz

customer_reviews.title: FunBeach toy
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old had a blast finding shells in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: kimme

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was looking for at a great price. A++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Larry S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great produce!!
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry I’m returning the merchandise because I order the wrong one, Im ordering the 47’ long instead, they look amazing, I can’t wait to the get the right one I’m going to use it as a she’ll pick because with a back surgery I won’t be able to bend down, thank you for the bright idea,
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Funny i use this as an egg collector for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Funny i use this as an egg collector for my chicken coop and its the best egg collector to reach way back in the nesting box. Weird use i know but perfect and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn stanley

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I don't have to nearly faceplant into my spouse's cat's litter box. It has been great. No more getting too close for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: this is the best pooper scooper ever
customer_reviews.text: this is the best pooper scooper ever!!! I LOVE IT!!!! My back doesn't hurt anymore or my knees when I clean the litter box. It is very sturdy as well unlike plastic scoopers. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: M.Van Eck

customer_reviews.title: use it in my chicken coop, does not work ...
customer_reviews.text: use it in my chicken coop, does not work as expected with the round design, makes it hard to pick up the chicken poop without pushing everything to a corner!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger and square would be better
customer_reviews.text: Just having abdominal surgery, I could not bend down to clean the litter box. This scoop was a great convenience. The only drawback was the round construction. It would do a better job if it was square and a little larger. Maybe it's my felines 'output'!
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Koop

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for sea shells and fossils. What a body saver
customer_reviews.author: sunshinegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not For Multi Cat Households
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to see this product as I have back problems. However, when I actually used it, it was too small and weak to actually pick up the urine clumps. I have multiple cats and this seems to be a better fit for a single cat household. I found a much better one completely made of metal at Petsmart that works MUCH better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dmurowany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am physically disabled and in a wheelchair. I bought this to make cleaning my cats litter box easier on me since I am unable to get down on the floor. This long handle makes it so I can scoop the dirty litter without having to strain to bend over in my wheelchair. It's great! I don't know what I'd do without it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: We use it to clean the chicken coop's sand box. The basket is a little small for that purpose, but it feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made and works very well cleaning the kitty litter and I don't have to bend down.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy reach
customer_reviews.text: I like the length but on reflection, it would have been better if the basket were rectangular.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It says it is for cat litter...
customer_reviews.text: ....but it is NOT! It's for sifting for treasures on the beach~!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love fur babies...

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I needed after having back surgery, make scooping a little easier
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Sand Dipper Jr - Long Handle Back Saver Hygienic Cat Litter Scoop
product_meta.description:
SAVES LITTER and TIME
Pays for itself with the litter you don’t throw away. ¼ inch metal sieve pores means you quickly sieve thru the litter box and collect the bad but leave the good litter. 

STRONG and WELL BUILT
Not all kitty scoopers are alike. This is built with strong rust resistant steel and a good mesh size for quickly sifting litter. 

TOUGH METAL MATERIALS
It costs more to make a metal kitty litter scoop, but it is worth the results. It quickly sifts the litter, saves the good litter. And guess what, since it is metal and not plastic, no static litter dust is stuck to the scoop. 

Perfect for Most Cat households
This is a great scoop which is great for most cat households based on reviews. It is not the largest scoop, and it has a round shape, but most folks love it for making quick scooping easy. 

GREAT WARRANTY
One-Year No questions asked replace or refund policy.
feature_bullets: Long Handle - prevents inhalation of harmful dust and provides a more hygienic litter disposal experience at 'arms length'.
Did we mention the Long Handle - over 27" reach - this means less bending and less back strain
Rugged stainless steel basket sifts and lifts clumps easily with no static dust buildup.
Superior Quality Materials Mean Long Life – Marine grade stainless steel basket, lightweight aluminum ski pole technology, and secure handle with wrist loop for easy hanging.
One year warranty. When was the last time you bought a kitty litter scoop with a warranty.
